publications.title: Generation of a gene-corrected human isogenic iPSC line from an Alzheimer’s disease iPSC line carrying the London mutation in APP (V717I)

donor.disease_description: Donor carried APP London mutation (V717I, rs63750264) in exon 17 of APP

genomic_modifications.description: Gene correction of APP V717I (London) mutation with introduction of a silent PAM-site change (codon TTA->TTG) to prevent re-cutting.
genomic_modifications.genotype: rs63750264 G/G (corrected from A/G); includes silent PAM codon change TTA>TTG

genomic_characterisation.summary: Copy number variation analysis using Illumina Infinium CoreExome-24 v1.1 showed absence of deletions, insertions and aneuploidies; sex chromosomes cropped to maintain blinding.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal vectors (containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28 and shRNA against p53)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee
